channel.title: tech on Uncombed Whiskers
channel.description: Recent content in tech on Uncombed Whiskers

item.title: Threat Horizons
item.description: Latest Threat Horizons report from Google Cloud is out! Insights These are a few insights from it. 57.4% Cloud Compromises are due to weak or no credentials You’ve got to be kidding me! It’s 2022 for Pete’s sake! At least use STRONG password and MFA, if nothing else! 65% of Compromises are used for Crypto Mining A bit surprising but it is what it is. SSH, WordPress, and RDP are most targeted Not surprized at all!

item.title: Week1
item.description: As the first week at the new gig draws to a close, the total absurdity (in a very good way) of the development, build & deploy system here just blows my mind. I do not know if this is something I know enough about to discuss at this time or if that’s even allowed (you know NDA and such), but I can say for sure that the immense amount of engineer time & productivity lost in my last gig could have been salvaged - if only we had spent enough time thinking about & working on reducing the build & deploy times over the years, instead of sitting on our haunches, patting our backs & basking in the light of past laurels ðŸ˜ž
